pages.text: 69|35|Pas, imruz dar in co dusti samimi [va mehruʙone] nadorad [ki jorias kunad]
69|36|Va ƣizoe ʙa cuz cirku xun nadorad
69|37|[Ƣizoe, ki] Cuz gunahgoron onro namexurand»
69|38|Pas, savgand ʙa on ci meʙined
69|39|Va ʙa on ci nameʙined
69|40|Be tardid, in [Qur'on suxani Alloh taolo ast, ki iʙloƣas ʙa pajomʙar ʙar uhdai] firistodai ʙuzurgvor [Caʙrail] ast
69|41|Va inho guftori soire nest, [ammo sumo kofiron] kamtar imon meovared
69|42|Va [niz] guftori kohine nest, [ammo sumo] kamtar pand megired
69|43|Az suji Parvardigori cahonijon nozil sudaast
69|44|Va agar [pajomʙar] suxanon [-i duruƣ] ʙar Mo meʙast
69|45|Musallaman, Mo dasti rosti uro megiriftem
69|46|Sipas [soh] ragi qalʙasro qat' mekardem
69|47|Va hec jak az sumo nametavonist mone' [-i azoʙ]-i u gardad
69|48|Jaqinan, in [Qur'on] pandu tazkire ʙaroi parhezkoron ast
69|49|Va Mo jaqinan, medonem, ki ʙarxe az sumo takziʙkunandagon [-i in kalomi ilohi] hasted
69|50|Va hamono in [Qur'on] ʙar kofiron mojai hasratu nadomat ast
69|51|Va ʙe gumon, in [Qur'on] haqiqati rostin ast
69|52|Pas, [ej pajomʙar] ʙo [zikri] nomi Parvardigori ʙuzurgat [Uro] tasʙeh guj
70|1|Darxostkunandae [ʙa tamasxur] taqozoi azoʙero kard, ki vuquas [dar qijomat] hatmi ast
70|2|[In azoʙ] Baroi kofiron ast [va] hec daf'kunandae nadorad
70|3|Az suji Alloh taolo [ʙa vuqu' mepajvandad, ki] sohiʙi marotiʙ va daracoti volost
70|4|Faristagon va Ruh [Caʙrail] ʙa suji U uruc mekunand, dar ruze, ki miqdoras [dar miqjosi ʙasari] pancoh hazor sol ast
70|5|Pas, tu [ej pajomʙar, dar ʙaroʙari tamasxuri eson] saʙri naku pesa kun
70|6|Be gumon, onho on [ruz]-ro dur meʙinand
70|7|Va Mo onro nazdik meʙinem
70|8|[Hamon] Ruze, ki osmon cun misi gudoxta savad
70|9|Va kuhho monandi pasmi rangin [mutalosi va parokanda] savad
70|10|Va hec dusti samimi [va xesovande] az [holi] dusti samimi [va xesovandas] namepursad
